name: Butler Canyon (Main Fork)
description:
Introduction

One mandatory rappel has a 40’ drop but 30’ of webbing. Three notable downclimbs of 15 to 25’. A few narrows for stemming. A couple pools easy to avoid. Very scenic straightforward canyon. Without a shuttle adds 1 hour of hiking time. Stunning area overlooks Dirty Devil to the east, Northwash to the south, Henry Mountains to the south and west.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
